SEARCH
Package sustech.cs304.utils

Class AlterUtils

java.lang.Object
sustech.cs304.utils.AlterUtils
public class AlterUtils extends Object
Utility class providing various dialog and form helpers for JavaFX applications, such as confirmation alerts, info alerts, input forms for announcements, assignments, resources, courses, invitations, member/friend management, and submission viewing.

Most dialogs are modal and styled to inherit the owner's stylesheets if present. The data models referenced (e.g., Announce, Assignment, Resource, User, Course, Submission) should be present in the application domain.

    • showConfirmationAlert

      public static boolean showConfirmationAlert(javafx.stage.Stage owner, String title, String header, String content)
      Shows a modal confirmation alert with Yes/No buttons.
      Parameters:
      owner - The parent window for modality.
      title - The dialog title.
      header - The header message.
      content - The content message.
      Returns:
      true if "Yes" was clicked, false otherwise.

    • showInfoAlert

      header - The header message.
      content - The content message.

    • showAnnounceInputForm

      public static Announce showAnnounceInputForm(javafx.stage.Stage owner, String courseId)
      Displays a modal form to input a new announcement.
      Parameters:
      owner - The parent window for modality.
      courseId - The course ID to associate with the announcement.
      Returns:
      An Announce object if submitted, or null if cancelled.

    • showInputForm

      public static Map<String,String> showInputForm(javafx.stage.Stage owner, String title, List<String> fields)
      Displays a modal generic input form with dynamic fields.
      Parameters:
      owner - The parent window for modality.
      title - The dialog title.
      fields - A list of field names to display.
      Returns:
      A map of field names to user-input values if submitted, or null if cancelled.

    • courseInputForm

      public static Map<String,String> courseInputForm(javafx.stage.Stage owner)
      Displays a modal form to input a new course, including name and description.
      Parameters:
      owner - The parent window for modality.
      Returns:
      A map with "courseName" and "courseDescription" if submitted, or null if cancelled.

    • showMemberList

      public static void showMemberList(javafx.stage.Stage owner, List<User> members)
      Shows a modal dialog containing a member/friend list, allowing friend requests.
      Parameters:
      owner - The parent window for modality.
      members - The list of users to display.

    • showNewRequestList

      Shows a modal dialog with new friend requests and Accept/Reject actions.
      Parameters:
      owner - The parent window for modality.
      requests - The list of requesting users.

      Parameters:
      owner - The parent window for modality.
      courses - The list of courses the user is invited to.

    • showSubmission

      Shows a modal dialog listing submissions for a given assignment, with download capability.
      Parameters:
      owner - The parent window for modality.
      assignmentId - The assignment ID whose submissions to display.
